name: Umbrella Product Routing - NY Umbrella GEICO
description: Test case for umbrella insurance product routing
input: I'm looking for umbrella insurance in New York. I already have auto and home insurance with GEICO, and I want additional liability coverage. I'm 50 years old and own a home.

expectedRoute.rationale: GEICO offers umbrella insurance in New York and customer already has auto and home policies with GEICO.
